name: Lost On Jupiter
description:
After the discovery of an anomaly inside the gas giant, Jupiter, you are sent to investigate the strange phenomenon. But, as you approach the planet, your ship and crew are pulled into its atmosphere. Now, with your ship destroyed and your crew scattered, you must survive and look for your crewmates so that you can escape.

Explore the vast mushroom jungles.

Exploit the land and mine the newly discovered mineral crystal.

Exterminate the inhabitants as they try to defend their lands... Or seek your aid?

Expand your reach and prepare for the ever-growing hordes.
